蛫蛫蛫

蛫字的基本解释

蛫
guǐ
古书上说的一种蟹。
传说中的一种异兽，状如龟，红头白身。

蛫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》過委切，上紙，見。］
(1)蟹属。
(2)异兽名。

蛫字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1082第30
【唐韻】過委切，音詭。【說文】蟹也。【集韻】蟹六足者。一曰鼠負。　又【類篇】一曰猿類。　又【山海經】卽公之山有獸焉，其狀如龜而白身赤骨，名曰蛫，是可以禦火。【司馬相如·上林賦】獑胡豰蛫。

蛫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蛫字的起名意思

暂无。

Chuck
Basic explanation of words
Chuck
guǐ
A kind of crab said in ancient books.
A legendary animal, resembling a turtle, with a red head and white body.
Chuck
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guangyun" has been cut, put on paper, see you. ]
(1) Crab genus.
(2) The name of a different animal.
Chuck
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛫; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1082 30
[Tang Yun] Overwhelmingly, the sound is tricky. [Said the text] Crab too. [Jiyun] Crab with six legs. One is the mouse.　[Classes] One is apes.　 [Shan Hai Jing] There is a beast on the mountain of Gong Gong, which is like a turtle and white body and bare bones. The name is chuck, which can protect against fire. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Xian Hu Zhe.
Chuck
